trans-unit.target: Devolve os dados a partir de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language.
trans-unit.target: Um phoneme é um componente básico de idioma de escrita.

trans-unit.source: For more information about phonemes, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre fonemas, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position of the phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição do phoneme áudio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_TimeSpan" name="TimeSpan" href=""></xref> object indicating the audio position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_TimeSpan" name="TimeSpan" href=""> </xref> objeto que indica a posição de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the phoneme.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_TimeSpan" name="TimeSpan" href=""></xref> object indicating the duration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_TimeSpan" name="TimeSpan" href=""> </xref> que indica a duração do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the emphasis of the phoneme.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_SynthesizerEmphasis" name="SynthesizerEmphasis" href=""></xref> member indicating the level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_SynthesizerEmphasis" name="SynthesizerEmphasis" href=""> </xref> membro que indica o nível de ênfase.

trans-unit.source: Gets the phoneme following the phoneme associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o phoneme seguir phoneme associado a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the next phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o phoneme seguinte.

trans-unit.source: The phoneme associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached"></xref> event.
